column5: I went this afternoon fishing for bass, It was freakin hot lolz but fishin was hot too... Didn't take alot of pic, look all the same anyway... Hope everyone is doing well!...
Good show! I went today to two spots and got seven, but they were all smaller than yours.
Another awesome bunch of Bass bfisher.  The weather has cooled down here a bit, man has it been a hot summer!
I caught alot of small ones too... but they fought harder than the larger ones... thnx dana
thnx simon... oh it was very hot.. thought I can stay in the sun but after 2hrs I hide in the shade... all in all it was a good day..
